Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Jackson/Campbell
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses temp. rerouted WB: Jackson, Western, Van Buren, California and Jackson; EB: Jackson, California, Harrison, Western and Jackson

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Jackson/Campbell, due to street blockage.

Westbound: Jackson, Western, Van Buren, California and Jackson

Eastbound: Jackson, California, Harrison, Western and Jackson

Allow extra travel time.
